languages.text: {n}Кассия наслаждается каждым глотком свежего воздуха, чуть опустив веки и прислушиваясь к пению птиц, скрытых от вашего взора кронами деревьев. Когда кончики ваших пальцев едва заметно соприкасаются, Кассия вздрагивает... но не отводит руки. В смущенном молчании несколько минут проносятся считанными секундами, и девушка чуть отстраняется.{/n} "Здесь... умиротворенно, не находите?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия наслаждается каждым глотком свежего воздуха, чуть опустив веки и прислушиваясь к пению птиц, скрытых от вашего взора кронами деревьев. Когда кончики ваших пальцев едва заметно соприкасаются, Кассия взрагивает... но не отводит руки. В смущенном молчании несколько минут проносятся считанными секундами, и девушка чуть отстраняется.{/n} "Здесь... умиротворенно, не находите?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia relishes every breath of fresh air, her eyes half-closed, listening to the sounds of birds hidden from view by the treetops. When the tips of your fingers touch lightly, Cassia starts... but does not remove her hand. Several minutes pass in timid silence like mere moments, and eventually she pulls away.{/n} "This place... eases the soul, wouldn't you agree?"

languages.text: {n}卡西娅半眯着眼睛，聆听着树丛中的传来的鸟儿啁啾，全心全意地享受着每一口新鲜的空气。你们的指尖轻轻相触，她似乎吃了一惊……但并未躲开。几分钟的时间在羞赧的沉默中流逝，感觉却像只过去了短短的一瞬。她收回了手。{/n}“这个地方……真让人心平气和，不是吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia relishes every breath of fresh air, her eyes half-closed, listening to the sounds of birds hidden from view by the treetops. When the tips of your fingers touch lightly, Cassia starts... but does not remove her hand. Several minutes pass in timid silence like mere moments, and eventually she pulls away.{/n} "This place... eases the soul, wouldn't you agree?"

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia genießt jeden Atemzug der frischen Luft. Mit halb geschlossenen Augen lauscht sie dem Gesang der Vögel, die sich in den Baumspitzen verbergen. Als sich eure Fingerspitzen leicht berühren, erschrickt Cassia ... entfernt ihre Hand jedoch nicht. Mehrere Minuten vergehen in schüchternem Schweigen, als wären es nur einige Augenblicke, dann entfernt sie sich schließlich ein wenig von dir.{/n} "Diese Welt ... beruhigt die Seele, findet Ihr nicht auch?"
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia relishes every breath of fresh air, her eyes half-closed, listening to the sounds of birds hidden from view by the treetops. When the tips of your fingers touch lightly, Cassia starts... but does not remove her hand. Several minutes pass in timid silence like mere moments, and eventually she pulls away.{/n} "This place... eases the soul, wouldn't you agree?"

Mehrere Minuten vergehen in schüchternem Schweigen, als wären es nur einige Augenblicke, dann entfernt sie sich schließlich ein wenig von dir.{/n} "Diese Welt ... beruhigt die Seele, findet Ihr nicht auch?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia se délecte de chaque goulée d'air frais, les paupières mi-closes, en écoutant le chant des oiseaux dissimulés aux regards par les frondaisons des arbres. Lorsque les extrémités de vos doigts s'effleurent, Cassia sursaute... mais ne retire pas sa main. Plusieurs minutes s'écoulent trop rapidement dans un timide silence, puis elle finit par s'écarter.{/n} « Cet endroit... Il apaise l'âme, vous ne trouvez pas ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia relishes every breath of fresh air, her eyes half-closed, listening to the sounds of birds hidden from view by the treetops. When the tips of your fingers touch lightly, Cassia starts... but does not remove her hand. Several minutes pass in timid silence like mere moments, and eventually she pulls away.{/n} "This place... eases the soul, wouldn't you agree?"

Plusieurs minutes s'écoulent trop rapidement dans un timide silence, puis elle finit par s'écarter.{/n} « Cet endroit... Il apaise l'âme, vous ne trouvez pas ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia saborea cada bocanada de aire fresco con los ojos entrecerrados escuchando los sonidos de los pájaros ocultos a la vista por las copas de los árboles. Cuando las puntas de vuestros dedos se rozan ligeramente, Cassia se sobresalta... pero no mueve la mano. Pasan varios minutos en los que el tímido silencio os envuelve y finalmente ella se aparta.{/n} «Este lugar... es un respiro para el alma, ¿no cree?».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia relishes every breath of fresh air, her eyes half-closed, listening to the sounds of birds hidden from view by the treetops. When the tips of your fingers touch lightly, Cassia starts... but does not remove her hand. Several minutes pass in timid silence like mere moments, and eventually she pulls away.{/n} "This place... eases the soul, wouldn't you agree?"

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは息を吸い込むごとに新鮮な空気を味わう。目を半分閉じ、木の上にとまり姿を見せない鳥の鳴き声に聞き入る。あなたの指先が軽く触れると、カシアは動き始める…が、手を離そうとはしない。数分間のドギマギとした沈黙は一瞬のように感じられ、ようやく彼女は離れる。{/n}「この場所は…魂が安らぐと思いませんか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia relishes every breath of fresh air, her eyes half-closed, listening to the sounds of birds hidden from view by the treetops. When the tips of your fingers touch lightly, Cassia starts... but does not remove her hand. Several minutes pass in timid silence like mere moments, and eventually she pulls away.{/n} "This place... eases the soul, wouldn't you agree?"

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Gözleri yarı kapalı olan Cassia, içine çektiği temiz hava dolu her nefesin tadını çıkarıyor. Ağaç tepelerine gizlenmiş kuşların cıvıltılarını dinliyor. Parmaklarınızın uçları hafiften birbirine değince irkiliyor... Yine de elini çekmiyor. Bu çekingen sessizlikte geçirdiğiniz dakikalar, göz açıp kapayıncaya kadar bitmiş gibi geliyor. Nihayet Cassia geri çekiliyor.{/n} "Tam anlamıyla... Ruhu dinlendiren bir yer. Ne diyorsun?"
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia relishes every breath of fresh air, her eyes half-closed, listening to the sounds of birds hidden from view by the treetops. When the tips of your fingers touch lightly, Cassia starts... but does not remove her hand. Several minutes pass in timid silence like mere moments, and eventually she pulls away.{/n} "This place... eases the soul, wouldn't you agree?"
